thread.title: Where do we stand on: Unfriending colleagues on Facebook
thread.title_full: Where do we stand on: Unfriending colleagues on Facebook

author: India Sturgis
title: Where do we stand on: Unfriending colleagues on Facebook
text: Facebook Where do we stand on: Unfriending colleagues on Facebook A tribunal in Tasmania ruled this week that 'unfriending' someone on Facebook equals bullying in the workplace, but is it ever acceptable to trim down your online acquaintances? Facebook has launched a kitemark system for apps developed on the HTML5 system, which aims to standardise products so that they work on all mobile devices and all networks Photo: Alamy
